alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 11 at 3:50AM PST until March 12 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING NEAR BEACHES AND HEADLANDS... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 60 to 65 mph possible near beaches and headlands. South winds 15 to 25 with gusts 35 to 45 mph for coastal communities. * WHERE...Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
